Package lab8

Class RecursiveQuestion.Towers

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab8.RecursiveQuestion.Towers
  • Enclosing class:
    RecursiveQuestion
    public static class RecursiveQuestion.Towers
extends java.lang.Object
    Towers has 3 towers each of length n. Rings are placed on towers from the bottom up. Only the top ring can be taken from a tower. A ring can only be placed on top of a ring with a larger diameter. The top instance variables hold the place of the top ring in a tower. If the tower is empty, the top is set to null. If the tower A has 1 ring, topA is set to 0. Rings are placed in a tower array from left to right. The empty spots in the array are set to 0. A ring can not have the value 0.
